features: Products include: 3 pieces cabinet door trash bag hooks that fit most kitchen trash bags and you can hang them easily with no effort, 3 sets are enough for family use, kitchen, living room, bedroom, study, all can be applied

Size information: measures approx. 7.24 x 6.5 inches, suitable for cabinets with thickness less than 1.1 inches/ 2.8 cm (do not use a door thickness more than 2.8 cm), please make sure that the gap of the door must be more than 2 mm in order to work properly

Practical design: our trash bag hooks are supported with double hooks for greater stability and share the weight between the hooks, which fits all standard kitchen cabinet doors and is easy to install

Multi-purpose: place the hook on the cabinet door, suitable for storing all your plastic bags, garbage bags, reusable grocery bags, tote bags, etc., proper for kitchen, pantry, bathroom, dormitory, utility room or office

No space: just hang on the cabinet door, it does not take up a lot of space, no need to put a large trash can, the large opening is easy to fill, and can be applied with reusable sundries bag very good
body.description: Feature: Simple to use: Double hook design, good supporting force, larger opening can fill more garbage and sundries. Fits all standard kitchen cabinet doors and is easy to install. Scope of application: Suitable for cabinet doors with thickness less than 1.1 inches/ 2.8 cm (can't use doors with thickness greater than 2.8 cm) Apply to: Suitable for storing all your plastic bags, kitchen, pantry, bathroom, dormitory, utility room or office. Specifications: Color: as pictures show Material: iron Size: approx. 7.24 x 6.5 inches Quantity: 3 pieces Package includes: 3 x Cabinet door trash bag hooks Warm notes: Please allow slight size error due to manual measurement. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit a 7/8" door or drawer snuggly.
reviews.reviewText: My friend uses plastic grocery bags for his trash can. This gets the bag off the counter. He will use one these to hold all his collected grocery bags. The white painted coating gives the impression they will easily wipe clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good in theory...
reviews.reviewText: These are good in theory but the bags aren't heavy enough to stay on the handle,and when it's full enough to be weighted down it's drooping too low for the cabinet to close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are ok
reviews.reviewText: It's cheap and not too sturdy but I just use it to hang grocerry plastic bags not for heavy things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this!!! The concept is good but the craftmanship is very poor.
reviews.reviewText: These are NOT sturdy bag holders & so DO NOT meet the specifications. It is not worth buying because it did not last long. I have had them for a months but they NOT meet my expectations. The pieces that hng over your cabinet fall off. The welding was not done properly, it falls off. The whole thing just falls to the floor leaving a mess. Now I need to buy other better welded or made Cabinet Plastic Bag Holder Hanging Trash Bag Holders. Waste of money, time & a big disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes in handy!
reviews.reviewText: I use it when I’m cleaning meat or any foods, I hang it on the drawer of the cabinet that way I don’t keep walking over to the trash bin and I don’t have stinky foods in my house trash can, I can dump it straight outside garage when I’m finished. Love would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How awesome are these?
reviews.reviewText: These things are awesome! It's so nice to have an open bag so close to the counter when cooking to toss scraps!We use another one for soda cans and bottles.The only downside I can find is if your cabinet door or drawer has a round side you are limited on what side this can hang off of. A small drawback, though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The width/ opening is too small
reviews.reviewText: I am disappointed with the width/ size of the opening. I had one from a long time ago and it had a bigger opening. I use this, and the 1000's of plastic bags I get, to dump dog poo into. I have it installed next to the pooper scooper. It holds the bag open and it is easy to remove, tie it closed and toss in the garbage can.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pratique pour utiliser les sacs d’emballage de légumes en poubelles
reviews.reviewText: Après modification j’ai adapté dans mes poubelles sous évier de tri sélectif ,de 12 litresAttention c’est de l’inoxydable ,si vous redressez les 2 pattes elles cassent
